publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1538 Brian Adam: Traffic Chaos in Aberdeen—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to assist urgently Aberdeen City Council in addressing the continued road chaos in the north of the city following the closure of the Grandholm Bridge and to make a commitment finally to financial support for the Western Peripheral route round Aberdeen.
S1M-1538 Traffic Chaos in Aberdeen (lodged on 15 January 2001) Richard Lochhead*, Shona Robison*
S1M-1538 Traffic Chaos in Aberdeen (lodged on 15 January 2001) Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-1538 Brian Adam: Traffic Chaos in Aberdeen—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to assist urgently Aberdeen City Council in addressing the continued road chaos in the north of the city following the closure of the Grandholm Bridge and to make a commitment finally to financial support for the Western Peripheral route round Aberdeen. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Shona Robison, Tommy Sheridan
S1M-1538 Traffic Chaos in Aberdeen (lodged on 15 January 2001) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-1538 Traffic Chaos in Aberdeen (lodged on 15 January 2001) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Mr David Davidson*, Irene McGugan*
S1M-1538 Traffic Chaos in Aberdeen (lodged on 15 January 2001) Nora Radcliffe*

S1M-1538 Brian Adam: Traffic Chaos in Aberdeen—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to assist urgently Aberdeen City Council in addressing the continued road chaos in the north of the city following the closure of the Grandholm Bridge and to make a commitment finally to financial support for the Western Peripheral route round Aberdeen. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Shona Robison, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Fiona McLeod, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Mr David Davidson, Irene McGugan, Nora Radcliffe
S1M-1538 Traffic Chaos in Aberdeen (lodged on 15 January 2001) Fergus Ewing*
